name: Espresso_Corner_Ladder_Bookcase_with_Five_Shelves
reviews: I thought it looked a little dinky in the picture but once I got it I was pleasantly surprised! Super easy to assembly, sturdy and the color is great!

Great bookcase is what I wanted and needed to put some of my family pictures to display. I like this bookcase it is perfect for my corner in my family room. It very easy to put together. Some of shelves are not quiet as large as I thought they would be.

I needed something for a bathroom and this worked great and matched the cabinet color. It comes in pieces but even I could put it together by myself - and I am not handy with tools! Price was good and it came quickly.
The shelves are not really wide enough for more than a couple of books-I have figurines on the shelves. Very well made and sturdy, perks up a corner.
The stand was easy to assemble and was exactly what I needed in the corner of my room.
Easy to put together. Shipped without any problems. Looks great
I was not sure about this product, until it was assembled and in place. It fits neat and color was consistet with the site.Extremely happy with this product.....
description:
This decorative corner ladder bookcase is constructed of durable
wood with an espresso brown finish. Five storage shelves offer
space to display books and collectibles. Colors: BrownFrame materials: Wood, metalFinish: EspressoFive (5) storage shelvesIntended for residential use onlyNumber of shelves: Five (5)Dimensions: 13.25 inches wide x 13.25 inches deep x 72 inches
  highStyleContemporary, Modern, TraditionalMaterialVeneer, WoodFinishEspresso FinishShelf TypeHorizontalAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownNumber of Shelf5
